Sentencas: Ammonia has been considered a promising alternative energy carrier due to its high hydrogen content and lack of carbon.
Titulo: Impact of the ammonia decomposition reaction over an anode on direct ammonia-fueled protonic ceramic fuel cells

Sentencas: Since ammonia readily decomposes into hydrogen and nitrogen at high temperatures, it can be used as a fuel for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Impact of the ammonia decomposition reaction over an anode on direct ammonia-fueled protonic ceramic fuel cells

Sentencas: In this work, the effect of the ammonia decomposition reaction over an anode on the performance of direct ammonia-fueled SOFCs was evaluated by electrochemical measurements and catalytic activity tests.
Titulo: Impact of the ammonia decomposition reaction over an anode on direct ammonia-fueled protonic ceramic fuel cells

Sentencas: A Ni-BaCe(0.4)Zr(0.4)Y(0.2)O(3-delta)cermet with excellent catalytic activity for ammonia decomposition was employed as the anode material.
Titulo: Impact of the ammonia decomposition reaction over an anode on direct ammonia-fueled protonic ceramic fuel cells

Sentencas: Impedance analyses revealed that the total cell resistance strongly depended on the ammonia fuel supply conditions.
Titulo: Impact of the ammonia decomposition reaction over an anode on direct ammonia-fueled protonic ceramic fuel cells

Sentencas: Particularly, the polarization resistance, which was attributed to a mass transfer process in the anode, increased at high ammonia concentrations and flow rates.
Titulo: Impact of the ammonia decomposition reaction over an anode on direct ammonia-fueled protonic ceramic fuel cells

Sentencas: On the other hand, in the catalytic activity tests, the conversion of ammonia over the cermet decreased under such fuel supply conditions.
Titulo: Impact of the ammonia decomposition reaction over an anode on direct ammonia-fueled protonic ceramic fuel cells

Sentencas: Hence, it was concluded that the performance of direct ammonia-fueled SOFCs significantly depended on the ammonia conversion over the anode.
Titulo: Impact of the ammonia decomposition reaction over an anode on direct ammonia-fueled protonic ceramic fuel cells

Sentencas: Additionally, a considerable reduction in the anode temperature as a result of the endothermic ammonia decomposition reaction was confirmed.
Titulo: Impact of the ammonia decomposition reaction over an anode on direct ammonia-fueled protonic ceramic fuel cells
